Hello!

To simulate lightfield camera on the dataset of chess images, run 'python3 main.py'

To simulate on other datasets, run 'python3 main.py --folder {FOLDER_ARG}'
where FOLDER_ARG is either chess, beans desk, or flower.

* any folder except 'inputs/' can be regenerated by main.py.

REPORT: https://inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~cs194-26/fa20/upload/files/projFinalAssigned/cs194-26-acx/
